Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Album für die Jugend, op. 68

1848

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 71'

  • 62. (appendix II no. 8) Ein Ländler von F. Schubert
  • Aus ist der Schmaus (McCorkle appendix no. 2)
  • Canon (McCorkle appendix no. 4)
  • Fugue (McCorkle appendix no. 7)
  • *** (McCorkle appendix no. 15)

The forty-three pieces are split into two books; the first (nos. 1–18) für Kleinere, and the second (nos. 19–43) für Erwachsenere.

Schumann also considered further pieces that were not included in the final collection. The nineteen completed pieces are included on these pages with the numbering by Ernst Herttrich from his edition for Henle. Incipits for four fragmentary pieces are also given. Further, the table below gives all thirty completed, fragmentary and planned pieces with the Herttrich numberings and the numbering from the McCorkle catalogue.

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/5 · RSA 1020 · ed. Michael Beiche [including nos. 44–62 and further sketches]
  • Associated Board · ed. Howard Ferguson [including nos. 44–48 and 53–54]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9641 · ed. Holger Stüwer [including nos. 44–49 and 51–62]
  • Henle · HN 928 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band V · ed. Ernst Herttrich [including nos. 44–62]
  • Henle · HN 929 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band V · ed. Ernst Herttrich [including nos. 44–62]
  • Henle · HN 45 · ed. Ernst Herttrich [including nos. 44–62]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50252 · ed. Michael Kube [including nos. 44–48 and 53–62]

44. (appendix I no. 1) Auf der Gondel

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

45. (appendix I no. 2) Bärentanz

Schumann made another version of this piece for piano duet, as the third of his Zwölf Klavierstücke für kleine und große Kinder (op. 85).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1

46. (appendix I no. 3) Für ganz Kleine

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1

47. (appendix I no. 4) Gukkuk im Versteck

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

49. (appendix I no. 6) ***

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

51. (appendix I no. 8) Lagune in Venedig

54. (appendix I no. 11) Rebus

55. (appendix II no. 1) Ein Thema von G. F. Händel

This is a version of the air from George Frideric Handel’s suite in E major (HWV 430).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

56. (appendix II no. 2) Ein Stückchen von J. S. Bach

This is a version of the menuet from Johann Sebastian Bach’s partita no. 5 (BWV 829).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

57. (appendix II no. 3) Ein Stückchen von Gluck

This is an arrangement of the aria Deh placatevi con me from Christoph Willibald Gluck’s opera Orfeo ed Euridice. It incorporates parts of the corresponding aria, Laissez-vous toucher par mes pleurs, from the later French version of the opera, Orphée et Eurydice.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2

58. (appendix II no. 4) Ein Stückchen von Mozart

This is an arrangement of the aria Vedrai, carino from Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart’s opera Don Giovanni (KV 527).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

59. (appendix II no. 5) Ein Stückchen von Beethoven

This is a version of the theme from the last movement of Ludwig van Beethoven’s sonata no. 30 (op. 109).

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2

60. (appendix II no. 6) Ein Trinklied von C. M. von Weber

This is an arrangement of the aria Hier im ird’schen Jammertal from Carl Maria von Weber’s opera Der Freischütz (op. 77).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

61. (appendix II no. 7) Eine berühmte Melodie von L. v. Beethoven

This is an arrangement of the An die Freude theme from the last movement of Ludwig van Beethoven’s symphony no. 9 (op. 125).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

62. (appendix II no. 8) Ein Ländler von F. Schubert

This is a version of a dance (D 783 no. 14) by Franz Schubert (D 783 no. 14).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

Aus ist der Schmaus (McCorkle appendix no. 2)

Canon (McCorkle appendix no. 4)

Fugue (McCorkle appendix no. 7)
